channel.title: HELP! lets me log in, but nothing loads. just black sceen with name at bottom!
channel.description:
I get this whenever i try to login, on my client it just shows my name a the bottom at the chat box where none of the login messages show, and the inventory is black as well as the map and screen.
This is what the Source "Run" shows after a little bit, it says "connection lost - attempting to restablish" bla bla bla. [IMG]http://img514.imageshack.us/img514/7577/helpc.png[/img] Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
Then it said the host (me) is banned.. PLEASE HELP!
[b]EDIT: I fixed it, sorry!
Lock please.[/b]

item.title: HELP! lets me log in, but nothing loads. just black sceen with name at bottom!
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

You’ve done something wrong in Shops.cgf (I think it’s called that). Remove the line off code which is in the file which you’ve done wrong/ or fix it (It’s show on the prompt).

Read full topic
item.source: HELP! lets me log in, but nothing loads. just black sceen with name at bottom!
